meanings.definition: A punctuation mark (‽) used to combine the functions of a question mark and an exclamation point.
meanings.sent1: I added an interabang at the end of my sentence to show both surprise and a question.
meanings.sent2: The interabang at the end of the sentence indicated a mix of excitement and inquiry.
meanings.sent3: The story ended with an unexpected interabang, leaving readers both puzzled and intrigued.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes widened like an interabang, expressing both shock and curiosity.
meanings.sent5: The interabang stood out on the page, capturing attention with its dual purpose.

meanings.definition: To use interabangs in writing for emphasis or to convey a sense of surprise or disbelief.
meanings.sent1: She interabangs her sentences to make them more impactful.
meanings.sent2: Interabanging his words, he made sure to express his astonishment clearly.
meanings.sent3: The author interabangs frequently, adding a touch of drama to the text.
meanings.sent4: His writing style interabangs like fireworks in the night sky, dazzling the readers.
meanings.sent5: Interabanging the paragraph, she highlighted the key points with flair.
